item.description:
Enjoy the amazing sounds of The Claflin Hill Symphony Orchestra

Dinner 5:45 pm
Concert: 7:30 pm

Springtime Pops: An American Postcard
Grofé: Grand Canyon Suite
Dvorak: Cello Concerto
Selections from Broadway & the
American Songbook
 
We have arranged a very special deal with Claflin Hill for a ticket price of only $20 per person. (Regular $35) Pay cash when you arrive. 

Dinner Details
5:45 pm meet at the Town Hall parking lot on the corner of Court and Main Streets to walk over to the Turtle Tavern (affordable pub, located at 72 Main Street). If you arrive after 5:45, meet us there. It's just one block up on the same side of the street as the Town Hall.

Skipping Dinner? Meet Us There
Say you are with Jacki's meetup group and buy your ticket for $20. The tickets are assigned, so you can go to your seat and wait for us there if you like.
item.name: Spring Time Pops in Milford
